name: Finansforbundet
goal: The Financial Services Union Denmark is the trade union for employees in the Danish financial area. We have approximately 50000 members in the financial and fintech area. Our primary goal is to take care of our members' rights and interests. Also, we have an interest in a sound and well-functioning financial sector.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Financial regulation, Fintech, digitalisation, Capital markets union, Financial taxation, financial supervision, refit, European Semester, corporate governance, employee information, consultation and participation, European Works Councils, European Services Card, Sustainable Finance
